game.name: Incremental Cats
game.shortDescription: Incremental Cats is a short incremental game about befriending cute cats of all rarities, from common to legendary, while generating cosmic amounts of hearts to unlock upgrades.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Incremental Cats is a short incremental game about befriending cute cats of all rarities, from common to legendary, while generating cosmic amounts of hearts to unlock upgrades.
